protocol_name: Idetification of  microRNA-93-5P binding site on the BMP-2 mRNA 3'UTR using psicheck2.0 vector and luciferase system
protocol_name_html: Idetification of  microRNA-93-5P binding site on the BMP-2 mRNA 3'UTR using psicheck2.0 vector and luciferase system
description: This protocol describes the affinity activity of microRNA93 through luciferase activity in 293T cells that have been transformed with a firefly luciferase coding sequence downstream of the BMP2 3'UTR. Using this methods we were able to idetificated microRNA93-5P binding the downstream 3'UTR of BMP-3 and inhibite the BMP-2 protein formation or not.
manuscript_citation: Zhang Y, Wei Q, Ding W, Zhang L, Wang H, Zhu Y, He W, Chai Y, Liu Y (2017) Increased microRNA-93-5p inhibits osteogenic differentiation by targeting bone morphogenetic protein-2. PLoS ONE 12(8): e0182678. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0182678

components.data:
A: synthes the DNA sequence and subclone in to psicheck2.0 

B: lysis bacterial and harvest plasmid
components.name: Description

components.data: Design psicheck2.0 plasmid which contain the BMP2 3'UTR prediction binding sequence
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Design psicheck2.0 plasmid which contain the BMP2 3'UTR prediction binding sequence

components.data:
1. Briefly thaw cells at 37 °C water bath.
  2. Let the cell spin for 5 min at 1,500 x g. Aspirate media, re-suspend cells and plate in T75 culture flask and cultured at 37 °C with 5% CO2. 
  3. Split the cells when they grow to 60% sub-confluency. 
    The cell line should be subcultured for one or two time before performing the actual assay. Then plate the cells into 24-well plates as triplicate according to the experimental conditions
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Briefly thaw cells at 37 °C water bath.
  2. Let the cell spin for 5 min at 1,500 x g. Aspirate media, re-suspend cells and plate in T75 culture flask and cultured at 37 °C with 5% CO2. 
  3. Split the cells when they grow to 60% sub-confluency. 
    The cell line should be subcultured for one or two time before performing the actual assay. Then plate the cells into 24-well plates as triplicate according to the experimental conditions

components.data: Grow low passage 293T cells from liquid nitrogen stock
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Grow low passage 293T cells from liquid nitrogen stock

components.data:
1. Day 0: Seed cells (density as above-mentioned) in a total volume of 500 μl complete growth media (DMEM/10%FBS).
  2. Day 1: Transfection ( use 3μg of psicheck2.0 and 50nm microRNA93 mimic, 2.5 μl lipo2000/well).
  3. Day 2: Change media 12h after transfection.
  4. Day 3: Change to serum deprived media.
  5. Day 5: Lyse cells

components.data:
1. Thaw dual-luciferase reporter reagents.
  2. Flash and prime Berthold luminometer with firefly luciferase and renilla luciferase substrate reagents.Read firefly and renilla luciferase signals (firefly luciferase signal is detected at 560 nm and renilla luciferase signal is detected at 480 nm).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Thaw dual-luciferase reporter reagents.
  2. Flash and prime Berthold luminometer with firefly luciferase and renilla luciferase substrate reagents.Read firefly and renilla luciferase signals (firefly luciferase signal is detected at 560 nm and renilla luciferase signal is detected at 480 nm).
